text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis America is doing so good with Coronavirus that we’ve been banned from visiting Europe.  Are they still calling you to praise what a great job you’re doing, you fucking liars?
